title: Crew Capsule
description: Pressurized crew capsule with room for six people, environmentally controlled for comfort, and among the largest windows to have flown in space.

title: Ring & Wedge Fins
description: Aerodynamically designed to stabilize the booster and reduce fuel use on its flight back to Earth.

title: Drag Brakes
description: Deploy from the ring fin to reduce the booster's speed by half on its descent from space.

title: BE-3PM Engine
description: Propels the rocket to space and restarts to uniquely slow the booster down to just 6 mph (9.7 km/h) for a controlled pinpoint landing on the pad.

title: Aft Fins
description: Stabilize the vehicle during ascent, steer it back to the landing pad on descent, and guide the rocket through airspeeds over Mach 3.
